description: Eita, a fifteen-year-old high school student, is a well-built classmate of Keisaku`s. When Margery Daw came to Misaki City, she randomly chose him and Keisaku to be her guides to the city. When they found a Haridan, a magical map to the city that Friagne had been using until his demise, the two boys often acted as her support.
name: Tanaka Eita
